description:
Description :
        The renowned author of erotic novels, Duan Jinghong, has a secret: with just a touch of skin, he can foresee others' intimate encounters. Duan Jinghong goes to great lengths to avoid physical contact, yet the infamous and imposing General Shen Tinglan inexplicably seeks him out, insisting on physical contact. What’s worse, Duan Jinghong foresees himself caught in a passionate affair with Shen Tinglan in the future... As disaster looms, Duan Jinghong finds himself unable to escape and is instead forced to collaborate with Shen Tinglan on the "Yunyou Sixteen Prefectures Lost Territories Case." To protect his "innocence," he engages in a battle of wits and schemes with Shen Tinglan, where hormones clash with reason in a fiery encounter.
